subject: Child Abuse and Neglect
Sex Crimes
Witnesses
lead_paragraph: Nervous and wide-eyed, Dorothy Sandusky testified, trying to repair her husband’s image after testimony that he sexually abused children in the Sanduskys’ home.
snippet: Nervous and wide-eyed, Dorothy Sandusky testified, trying to repair her husband’s image after testimony that he sexually abused children in the Sanduskys’ home.
